item.title: Enhanced Thinking
item.description: Evolution and our education systems are not incentivized to understand our minds. Learn the art of epistemic rationality to create mental maps that accurately represent the territory.

item.title: Effective Doing
item.description: Explore the art of applied rationality by learning techniques and frameworks that help you resolve conflicts between your Type1 and Type2 thinking to effectively achieve what you most want.

item.title: Coming Soon..
item.description: We are actively building Gyrus. For updates on our work, sign up with the form above.
